timeline.bodyText: That looks odd, is inverting the priority also done somewhere else?
timeline.author: gastaldi

replies.bodyText:
Higher priority means that the module should take precedence in case of the same module has been applied in a lower priority customizer.
Same as where higher priority in MP Config means that the Config Source take precedence
